https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/As3wb6ymfBE96rmGBLnZkqUUpxL.jpg A young couple, Alexander and Livia, take off on holiday to Romania. Hospitalized after being hit by a car, Alexander must undergo a blood transfusion—with horrifying consequences: upon his return, he seems afflicted with a strange disease. Chimères
